str2: A primary particle of present time; 'now'; also as noun or adjective present or immediate.
A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 1st Person Singular

str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 2nd Person Plural
str2: To do, perform, accomplish; be in any condition, i.e. I fare; I exact, require.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
Ignorance, inadvertence, sometimes with the idea of willful blindness. From agnoeo; ignorance.
Just as, as, even as. From hos and per; just as, i.e. Exactly like.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Present participle of archo; a first.
